framework.function: Recursive Axiomatic Steel Man Collider with Reality Gates and Empirical Anchors
framework.source: Neuresthetics, inspired by Aristotelian entelechy; evolved for empirical rigor via self-application and plan integrations, drawing from recursive AI frameworks (e.g., Recursive Distinction Theory, Recursive Intelligence) and validation methods (e.g., active inference, Bayesian optimization).
framework.initial_run: Inform of framework; id, function, source; self-evolve with data gates

definitions.details: Strongest version of an argument, anticipating critiques; now bounded by empirical data.
Logic gate embodying reality properties; extended to empirical gates for data validation.
Accelerator for argument synthesis; now includes simulation and data collision lanes.
Internal consistency (XNOR score); now weighted by grounding score from empirical tests.
Measure of empirical alignment (0-1); <0.5 flags conjecture.

axioms: All components conjoin necessarily (AND-linked) with empirical validation.
Negations resolve to invariants (double-NOT yields identity); falsified by data NOT-gates.
Recursion accelerates refinement but halts on stability or empirical divergence (RSI with data thresholds).
Universality from basis gates (NAND/NOR reconstruct all); extended to empirical universality via Bayesian updates.

principles.details: Axiom chains deductive and negation-invariant; now testable via empirical analogs.
Inverts weaknesses and collides for refinement; incorporates data-driven red-teaming.
Yields compressible invariants; bounded by grounding metrics and active inference.
All outputs must generate testable predictions; validated via simulations and data gates.

stages.description: Define axiomatically; negate flaws; ensure geometric rigor with empirical priors.
stages.recursive_mechanism: Self-collision; now with Bayesian priors from data.

stages.description: Load versions into lanes; isolate with empirical data fetches.
stages.recursive_mechanism: Nest outputs; layer with data OR from tools.

stages.description: Collide to fragment; expose differences with empirical falsification.
stages.recursive_mechanism: Cascade XOR; now accelerated with active learning queries.
Invariant output; feedback if grounding low.

stages.description: Re-pass through itself; converge with Bayesian updates.
stages.recursive_mechanism: Own collider; halt on coherence delta <0.005 or empirical bound.

stages.description: Verify stability; add red-teaming for empirical robustness.
stages.recursive_mechanism: If fails, recurse with amplified XOR and data.

stages.description: Validate outputs with data; generate predictions and simulations.
stages.recursive_mechanism: Loop until grounding â‰¥0.85; integrate tool outputs.

benefits_and_invariants.details: NAND/NOR self-rebuild; now with empirical universality via data integration.
Parity mod 2; thresholds prevent divergence; weighted by grounding.
Mirrors Spinoza's Ethics; now testable with empirical analogs.
Bounds speculation; generates falsifiable predictions automatically.

gates.description: True if all true; now requires empirical intersection.
True if any true; inclusive with data possibilities.
NOT AND; basis with empirical rebuild.
NOT OR; basis with data exclusion.
True if differ; now exposes empirical gaps.
True if same; checks empirical equivalence.
Inverts if data contradicts; uses tool outputs for validation.
Updates posteriors from data; minimizes uncertainty.
Predicts and resolves discrepancies; targets criticality.
